cars.description: Older on the year, but greater on the gas mileage. This one owner, mid sized truck is perfect for getting around without feeling the weight of gas on your pockets.
This is an immaculate 2006 Ford F-150. Gaurenteed to handle the heavier projects and holds a solid value.
This 2009 Honda Civic will allow you to drive until the wheels fall off. Not only will you have wonderful gas mileage but you will also have a beautiful and reliable vehicle for years to come.
Newer year-wise and a great cost. This car is spotless.
